verses.verse: A Song, a Psalm of the sons of Korah; for the Chief Musician; set to Mahalath Leannoth. Maschil of Heman the Ezrahite. O Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of my salvation <WH3444>, I have cried <WH6817> day <WH3117> and night before thee <WH3915>.
Let my prayer <WH8605> enter <WH935> into thy presence <WH6440>; Incline <WH5186> thine ear <WH241> unto my cry <WH7440>.
For my soul <WH5315> is full <WH7646> of troubles <WH7451>, And my life <WH2416> draweth nigh <WH5060> unto Sheol <WH7585>.
I am reckoned <WH2803> with them that go down <WH3381> into the pit <WH953>; I am as a man <WH1397> that hath no help <WH353>,

Cast <WH2670> off among the dead <WH4191>, Like the slain <WH2491> that lie <WH7901> in the grave <WH6913>, Whom thou rememberest <WH2142> no more <WH1504>, And they are cut off from thy hand <WH3027>.
Thou hast laid <WH7896> me in the lowest <WH8482> pit <WH953>, In dark <WH4285> places <WH4688>, in the deeps.
Thy wrath <WH2534> lieth hard <WH5564> upon me <WH6031>, And thou hast afflicted me with all thy waves <WH4867>. <WH5542>[[Selah
Thou hast put <WH7368> mine acquaintance <WH3045> far <WH7368> from me <WH7896>; Thou hast made me an abomination <WH8441> unto them <WH3607>: I am shut up, and I cannot come forth <WH3318>.

Mine eye <WH5869> wasteth <WH1669> away by reason of affliction <WH6040>: I have called <WH7121> daily <WH3117> upon thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah; I have spread forth <WH7849> my hands unto thee <WH3709>.
Wilt thou show <WH6213> wonders <WH6382> to the dead <WH4191>? Shall they that are deceased <WH7496> arise <WH6965> and praise <WH3034> thee <WH5542>? Selah
Shall thy lovingkindness <WH2617> be declared <WH5608> in the grave <WH6913>? Or thy faithfulness <WH530> in Destruction <WH11>?
Shall thy wonders <WH6382> be known <WH3045> in the dark <WH2822>? And thy righteousness <WH6666> in the land <WH776> of forgetfulness <WH5388>?
But unto thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah, have I cried <WH7768>; And in the morning <WH1242> shall my prayer <WH8605> come before thee <WH6923>.
Jehovah <WH3068>, why castest thou off <WH2186> my soul <WH5315>? Why hidest <WH5641> thou thy face from me <WH6440>?
I am afflicted <WH6041> and ready to die <WH1478> from my youth <WH5290> up <WH5375>: While I suffer thy terrors <WH367> I am distracted <WH6323>.
Thy fierce wrath <WH2740> is gone over <WH5674> me <WH1161>; Thy terrors have cut me off <WH6789>.
They came round about <WH5437> me like water <WH4325> all the day <WH3117> long <WH5362>; They compassed me about together <WH3162>.
Lover <WH157> and friend <WH7453> hast thou put far <WH7368> from me <WH3045>, And mine acquaintance into darkness <WH4285>.
